It works!

Congratulations! You successfully managed to set up KR Server.

If you are an end user and you see this message, the server is not configured yet.

Please wait some time so the administrator(s) of the servers can configure it.

Scripts

You can add a script to KR Server by:

    1. Writing the script
    2. Compiling it
    3. Adding it to the /scripts/ drectory
